title: Lakeside Beauty at the Edge of India
description: Indulge at Anantya, a tranquil lakeside Resort in Kanyakumari, located on the border of Kerala and Tamil Nadu. Find serenity in your private luxury cottage, with daily breakfast, one three-course dinner with a drink each, one 30-minute massage per person and a rubber plantation walk for two included.
offer_address: State Highway 45, Kaliel Village, Chittar Lake, Kanyakumari District, Alancholai, Tamil Nadu 629103, India
